typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		StreamEnd as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(UniqueOrderID = concat('1-', TransactionID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('1-', MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1-', CustomerID),
		SourceID = 1) ~> AddUniqueColumns
